--- Original Description --- This Mod adds protective apparel to lessen the effects of toxic fallout.
It adds apparel for different technology levels:
Filter Cloth (tribal) -35% toxic sensitivity
Gas Mask (industrial) -50% toxic sensitivity small protection bonus small shooting acuraccy penalty
Glitter Filter (advanced) -75% toxic sensitivity can be worn as a mouth guard or implanted directly in to the air tube
